title: Item changes are potentially huge Nasus buffs

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST. Today's patch & post will be [ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] VERY LARGE! ] The PBE has been updated with a massive amount of Preseason content! Continue reading for more information!

body:
Looking at the PBE item changes, I see that Sheen has a few relatively impactful changes that could be very, very good for Nasus, imo. The new stats are as followed (according to surrenderat20.net):

Sheen
    Cost reduced to 1050 from 1250
    No longer grants 25 AP
    Mana increased to 250 from 200
    Now grants 10% CDR

I think the new Sheen will be a must have first buy for Nasus now, whereas most people would buy Kindlegem or Glacial Shroud first for the CDR (depending if they were facing AD/AP lane opponent). Another change that I think looks really good is the Iceborn Gauntlet changes, which now grants additional CDR (up to 20%, due to CDR now on Sheen plus the 10% from Glacial Shroud), and slow area increases based on bonus armor, making it potentially more rewarding for building tankier.
